startups.name: Swaasthya
startups.description: Revolutionizing personal health with a smart nutrition companion! Tracks meals, decodes packaged food ingredients, provides actionable diet insights, and empowers users with personalized wellness recommendations for a healthier lifestyle.

startups.name: Locarzoo
startups.description: Transforming the used car marketplace! Streamlines buying and selling through verified inspections, servicing, and seamless documentation. Cuts out middlemen, reduces costs, and creates a trustworthy automotive ecosystem.

startups.name: Local Link
startups.description: Redefining community connectivity! Connects rental owners and tenants through a smart hold-and-renew system, slashing subscription fees, providing real-time neighborhood insights, and fostering meaningful local engagement.

startups.name: AI Contract Bidding
startups.description: Empowering smarter government bids! Leverages AI to predict fair contract prices, optimize bidding strategies, and prevent resource wastage. Enables competitive yet transparent bids, driving efficiency in public procurement.

startups.name: AI Construction Planner
startups.description: Building the future of construction management! Uses AI to accurately forecast material needs, costs, and timelines for projects. Optimizes resources, reduces overruns, and ensures projects stay on time and budget.
